data.title: Auburn West Apartments
data.meta_description: 1221 Colony Lane #218, Pontiac, MI 48340. Rent price: $1,075 / month, Studio - 20 bedroom floor plans, 3 available units, pet friendly, 59 photos, 4 videos.
data.text:
Auburn West Apartments Rent vs. Pontiac Average

Auburn West Apartments is asking 14% less than the average 2 bedroom apartment in Pontiac.

If you upsized to an average priced Pontiac 3 bedroom apartment, you would pay 7% more per month.

If you downsized to an average priced Pontiac 1 bedroom apartment, you would pay 24% less per month.

Auburn West Apartments provides 3% more square footage than the average Pontiac 2 bedroom apartment.

Availability in Pontiac

In order to find the best deal, you need to know what types of units are available. Property managers may be willing to give concessions if they have many vacant units.

There are currently 22 2BR units on the market in Pontiac. If you're looking to negotiate, this may be your best option.
